title: Lecture Note 1: Introduction to Number Systems

content.data: In this lecture, we introduce the concept of number systems. A number system defines how numbers are represented and includes topics like binary, decimal, and hexadecimal systems.
Understanding these systems forms the basis for digital computation and cryptography.

challenges.question: Which number system is base-2?
challenges.solution: The binary system uses base-2, meaning it consists of only 0s and 1s.
